Text: The only way this will be better is if someone puts the audio with this video uncropped. I'd rather deal with subtitles than people cut off to their faces. I'd do it myself but I don't know where people are getting the video at, or if the uncropped is the only thing available.

People didn't used to complain on TPB so much.  I been using TPB for several years and the uploading has always been this way.  And in case you didn't know, its been a long time since bootlegs that were dvd quality could be found.  They've been the quality that this copy of Dark Knight is for a long time.  And here's a little secret from someone who's been downloading these movies for a very long time, now days,  if you can see whats happening and it has good sound, its considered a good copy.  So as you can guess, the version of this movie thats going around right now is actually a pretty decent copy.  Must be allot of people new to downloading these movies, because like I stated earlier,  there didn't used to be so much complaining and name calling to the uploaders.  And guess what! As soon as they get a better copy, you'll know, because it will be posted in the title and the description.  So we don't need your input and you calling every uploader gay on every upload you see! HEDEDE!  Think about what your doing! You complain about the same movie being posted over and over, yet here you go posting the same over and over.  Maybe we need to point that out about your comments.  Like the fact that the one on this page is a clone of all your other comments, not to mention that its gay!  If you have a comment about something, great, post it, but stop repeating yourself and being a jerk to the uploaders!  You complain too much! Its called being a cry baby! Take notice that i'm not the only one tired of seeing your BS posted on every upload!

@rcr29budcar- You're absolutely right! People these days aren't as grateful and patient as before. We are in a different era of pop culture and hipsters are the only ppl trolling the internet. Since DVDs became the new form of home media bootleg quality has diminished.

Inflation up, economies down, bitching about free shit...up? Does not make sense, but is a sad indicator of where this world is headed. False senses of entitlement with minimal effort plague us in the West, and if we remain complacent to the growing numbers of women in mens clothing in our nations, we shall all perish from their selfish and complaining ways!!! lol Thanks to the uploaders for their work, no matter how inconsequential or redundant their posts may seem. Effort spent towards my entertainment, no matter how minimal, is still an effort. Effort spent complaining about practices you yourself have never contributed towards is counterproductive, reactive, and frankly worthy of world's number one cunt medal.
